/sw/sith/ompi/1.6.5/rhel6_gnu4.7.1/bin/mpicxx   -march=amdfam10 -msse3 -malign-double -fomit-frame-pointer -ffast-math -fopenmp -O3 -Drestrict=__restrict__ -finline-limit=1000 -fstrict-aliasing -funroll-all-loops -Wno-deprecated  -ftemplate-depth-60 -DADD_ -DINLINE_ALL=inline -DDISABLE_TIMER=1 -DUSE_REAL_STRUCT_FACTOR   CMakeFiles/getSupercell.dir/getSupercell.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/getSupercell -rdynamic /sw/redhat6/acml/5.3.0/gfortran64/lib/libacml.a -lz /ccs/compilers/gcc/rhel6-x86_64/4.7.1/lib64/libgfortran.so /ccs/home/zgu/adioshub/adios_sith/lib/libadios.a /ccs/home/zgu/adioshub/adios_sith/lib/libadios.a -Wl,-Bstatic -lm -Wl,-Bdynamic /sw/redhat6/mxml/2.6/rhel6_gnu4.7.1/lib/libmxml.a /sw/redhat6/dataspaces/1.2.0/rhel6_gnu4.7.1/lib/libdspaces.a /sw/redhat6/dataspaces/1.2.0/rhel6_gnu4.7.1/lib/libdscommon.a /sw/redhat6/dataspaces/1.2.0/rhel6_gnu4.7.1/lib/libdart.a -lrdmacm -libverbs -Wl,-rpath,/ccs/compilers/gcc/rhel6-x86_64/4.7.1/lib64
